Text: Thanks, I've been looking forward to this! Please upload the rest of the series if you have them.
Thanks! Yea, if you have the others that would be great!!!!!!!!!!

Thanx Dave!

If this is as good as everyone says it is, it'll be on my Christmas Present list.

Thanx! again

Thanks, upsdave, these films are incredible and I intend on getting them to people who have neither cable nor net access and no digital antennae either. It's very gracious of you to have these up. I'm wondering if I couldn't further tax your goodwill and request the 4th ep, Going Home (1920-1933)? Thanks very much in advance and thanks for the important posts.
I have the whole set, of which I will post, but as of right now I can't seem to upload anything. There is no upload code, and with out that, nuthin..
Sounds good, upsdave, thanks a lot. PB has been acting wonky as well for me these last few days but seems more stable now, so here's hoping...
